author: Gissou Nia, Gissou Nia
title: Like after 9/11, governments could use coronavirus to permanently roll back our civil liberties
description: The 'emergency' laws brought in after terrorism in 2001 reshaped the world — and there's evidence that it could happen again
content: With over a million confirmed cases and a death toll quickly approaching 100,000, Covid-19 is the worst pandemic in modern history by many orders of magnitude. That governments were unprepared to deal with a global pandemic is at this point obvious. What is w… [+5373 chars]
